price: (20) Indeed, the ones who oppose Allāh and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَذَلِّينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yuḥāddūna al-laha warasūlahu ulāika fī al-adhalīna
